scene.name: Light bulb replacement setup
scene.description: A table with a desk lamp or a standalone bulb socket and a compatible light bulb

task.name: Install and remove light bulb
task.description: First screw the light bulb into the socket, then unscrew it to remove it
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will practice replacing a light bulb. First, screw the bulb into the socket, and then unscrew it.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要练习更换灯泡。首先将灯泡拧进灯座，然后再把它拧出来。

subtasks.description: Execute the installation and removal sequence
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Please follow the steps to install and then remove the bulb.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：请按照步骤安装并拆卸灯泡。

steps.description: Install the light bulb by rotating it clockwise into the socket
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: start installing the light bulb.

steps.description: Remove the light bulb by rotating it counter-clockwise
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: start removing the light bulb.

constraints.notes: Ensure the bulb is correctly threaded before applying force; handle the glass part gently to prevent breakage.
